help.comment: Provides description of any given command.

string.comment: Name of the command you want to see a description of. This can be -a to see a list of all commands

problems.comment: Ouputs any errors linking command comments from an XML.

bool.comment: true will only display critical problems (commands defined in an XML but not in code)

cameraspeed.comment: Sets the speed of the free camera

float.comment: Desired speed of the free camera in units/second

info.comment: Specifies whether to render frames per second and number of triangles rendered

bool.comment: True - Render, False - Do Not Render

ambient.comment: Sets the ambient lighting of the environment

dircolor.comment: Sets the directional light color in the environment

lightdirection.comment: Sets the direction of the directional light. The direction will be normalized automatically.

joystick.comment: Enables/Disables the use of the joystick

boundingbox.comment: Enables/Disables the bounding box display around objects

terraindistort.comment: Enables/Disables the distortion of texture coordinates on the terrain.

lod.comment: Sets the level of detail of the terrain

int.comment: 0 - 2 with 0 being the highest detail. Any number out of range specifies distance base level of detail.
